name: Eye Spy (garyli, DannyU)
description:
Eye Spy is a game that attempts to simulate VR without the use of a headset or controller. It's a single-player game that takes place in a simulation. You must find every piece of intel without being detected by cameras for too long.

Controls
  • Hold Q and press WASD - Move player
  • Hold C- Move VR controller
  • Mouse - Rotate camera
  • Space - Jump
Credits Gary Li

Daniel O'Connell Programming, Design, Art, Sound
